Plot: James Franco's Sal chronicles the final hours of the life of actor Sal Mineo, one-time teen idol and star of the blockbuster films Rebel Without a Cause and Exodus.
Title: Sal
Writer: James Franco (story), Vince Jolivette (story), Val Lauren (story), Michael Gregg Michaud (book), Stacey Miller (screenplay), Stacey Miller (story)
Actors: Val Lauren, Jim Parrack, James Franco, Vince Jolivette
